products.title: [FREE Gerber Organic Cereal Sample] Nestle NAN OPTIPRO H.A. Stage 2 Formula
products.desc: NAN OPTIPRO H.A. 2 is a Premium Hypoallergenic Follow-up Formula for babies after 6 months. It provides your baby with the nutrients essential for growth and development. It contains OPTIPRO H.A. - a unique blend of whey proteins which are partially hydrolyzed - broken down into smaller pieces. This makes it easy to digest and helps to reduce the allergenic potential of cow's milk. H.A. (Hypoallergenic) means reduced risk of allergic reactions. NAN OPTIPRO H.A. 2 is specially suitable for babies with a family history of allergy. If your baby has already a declared allergy to cow's milk protein, do not use NAN OPTIPRO H.A. 2 without consulting your doctor.

products.title: Pampers Premium Care Tape Diapers Newborn - Trial Pack
products.desc: For a limited time only, Pampers Premium Care Newborn at 50-percent off. Suitable for babies up to 5 kg. Made in Japan Pampers Premium Care with 5 star skin protection also contains breathable cover that lets fresh air in and humid air out, helping to maintain his skin in its ideal condition. Made of soft materials, the Pampers Premium Care Baby Diapers cradle your baby's bottom in a net of breathable micro pores. This allows your baby to feel cool, fresh, and rash-free enough to stay comfortable throughout the day, even after several wettings. It is a drier and softer diaper for your baby, with the following unique set of extra features. New Improved Silky Softness. Distribute Evenly for Fast Absorbency. Stretchy Tape. 360 Fresh Air Breathability. Unique Hole Mesh Sheet.

secondary.name: About the Brand
secondary.content: Trial Pack. For a limited time only. 1 purchase per household. Pampers Baby Dry provides outstanding leakage protection through a Soft Touch-Dry Layer and Magic Gel that help absorb large amounts of liquid faster than ever before. Soft Touch-Dry Layer quickly absorbs wetness to keep it away from baby's skin. Magic Gel helps to absorb and lock in up to 7 wettings. Stretchy tape sides provide a superior fit. Breathable back sheet with micro holes that prevents stuffiness to increase comfort and avoid skin irritation. Playful new diaper designs. Easy to spot on shelf in vibrant, teal colored packaging. Wetness Indicator. The line turns into BLUE color and notifies urine. Under high temperature or high humidity condition, it might change colors before use, though this does not affect the quality of the product. Even in this case, BLUE is the color which indicates urination. (NB and Small only). Up to 5 Kg. Upton 12 hours of skin dryness.

products.title: Heineken Lager Beer - Case
products.desc: Heineken's consistent high quality, excellent craftsmanship and unique recipe since 1873 makes it the number one international premium beer in the world and is available in over 170 countries around the globe. Brewed using the original, unrivalled recipe invented three generations ago by the Heineken family, the 5% alcohol beer boasts of a fresh, fruity aroma accompanied by a mild bitter taste. Bright gold with exceptional clarity, Heineken is made using only the purest water, hops, barley malt and the famous A yeast, giving Heineken its truly distinctive flavour.
